subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic had a troubling autumn after winning the U.S. Open and sustaining an injury during the Davis Cup, but he roared back to beat Rafael Nadal in the final of the Australian Open.
snippet: Novak Djokovic had a troubling autumn after winning the U.S. Open and sustaining an injury during the Davis Cup, but he roared back to beat Rafael Nadal in the final of the Australian Open.
